register.description: This register enables the DSS domain power state transition. It controls the HW supervised domain power state transition between ON-ACTIVE and ON-INACTIVE states. It also hold one status bit per clock input of the domain.

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the HDMI_PHY_GFCLK clock in the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the HDMI_CEC_GFCLK clock in the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the DSS_SYS_GFCLK clock in the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the DSS_L4_GICLK clock in the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the SDVENC_GFCLK clock in the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the BB2D_GFCLK clock in the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the VIDEO2_PHY_GFCLK clock in the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the HDMI_DPLL_CLK clock in the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the VIDEO1_DPLL_CLK clock in the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the DSS_GFCLK clock in the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: This field indicates the state of the DSS_L3_GICLK clock in the domain. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Corresponding clock is definitely gated
Corresponding clock is running or gating/ungating transition is on-going

bitfield.description: Controls the clock state transition of the DSS clock domain.

bitenum.description: NO_SLEEP: Sleep transition cannot be initiated. Wakeup transition may however occur.
SW_SLEEP: Start a software forced sleep transition on the domain.
SW_WKUP: Start a software forced wake-up transition on the domain.
HW_AUTO: Automatic transition is enabled. Sleep and wakeup transition are based upon hardware conditions.

register.description: This register controls the static domain depedencies from DSS domain towards 'target' domains. It is relevant only for domain having system initiator(s).

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards L3MAIN1 clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is enabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards EMIF clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled
Dependency is enabled

bitfield.description: Static dependency towards IVA clock domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled
Dependency is enabled

register.description: This register controls the dynamic domain depedencies from DSS domain towards 'target' domains. It is relevant only for domain having OCP master port(s).

bitfield.description: Dynamic dependency towards L3MAIN1 domain

bitenum.description: Dependency is disabled

register.description: This register manages the DSS clocks.

bitfield.description: Module standby status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is functional (not in standby)
Module is in standby

bitfield.description: Module idle status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is fully functional, including OCP
Module is performing transition: wakeup, or sleep, or sleep abortion
Module is in Idle mode (only OCP part). It is functional if using separate functional clock
Module is disabled and cannot be accessed

bitfield.description: Optional functional clock control.

bitenum.description: Optional functional clock is disabled
Optional functional clock is enabled

bitfield.description: Optional functional clock control.

bitenum.description: Optional functional clock is disabled
Optional functional clock is enabled

bitfield.description: Optional functional clock control.

bitenum.description: Optional functional clock is disabled
Optional functional clock is enabled

bitfield.description: Optional functional clock control.

bitenum.description: Optional functional clock is disabled
Optional functional clock is enabled

bitfield.description: Optional functional clock control.

bitenum.description: Optional functional clock is disabled
Optional functional clock is enabled

bitfield.description: Optional functional clock control.

bitenum.description: Optional functional clock is disabled
Optional functional clock is enabled

bitfield.description: Control the way mandatory clocks are managed.

bitenum.description: Module is disabled by SW. Any OCP access to module results in an error, except if resulting from a module wakeup (asynchronous wakeup).

Module is explicitly enabled. Interface clock (if not used for functions) may be gated according to the clock domain state. Functional clocks are guaranteed to stay present. As long as in this configuration, power domain sleep transition cannot happen.

register.description: This register manages the BB2D clocks.

bitfield.description: Module standby status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is functional (not in standby)
Module is in standby

bitfield.description: Module idle status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is fully functional, including OCP
Module is performing transition: wakeup, or sleep, or sleep abortion
Module is in Idle mode (only OCP part). It is functional if using separate functional clock
Module is disabled and cannot be accessed

bitfield.description: Control the way mandatory clocks are managed.

bitenum.description: Module is disabled by SW. Any OCP access to module results in an error, except if resulting from a module wakeup (asynchronous wakeup).

Module is explicitly enabled. Interface clock (if not used for functions) may be gated according to the clock domain state. Functional clocks are guaranteed to stay present. As long as in this configuration, power domain sleep transition cannot happen.

bitfield.description: Module idle status. [warm reset insensitive]

bitenum.description: Module is fully functional, including OCP
Module is performing transition: wakeup, or sleep, or sleep abortion
Module is in Idle mode (only OCP part). It is functional if using separate functional clock
Module is disabled and cannot be accessed

bitfield.description: Control the way mandatory clocks are managed.

bitenum.description: Module is disabled by SW. Any OCP access to module results in an error, except if resulting from a module wakeup (asynchronous wakeup).

Module is explicitly enabled. Interface clock (if not used for functions) may be gated according to the clock domain state. Functional clocks are guaranteed to stay present. As long as in this configuration, power domain sleep transition cannot happen.
